title: New: Sweet Valley Slumber Party – Virgins
content: Having impressed with their demo’s back in February, Orange County duo Sweet Valley Slumber Party have returned with a stirring new single, set to be the first release from their debut LP, out in August. Virgins isn’t too much of a departure from their early work, yet certainly sees a progression in their songwriting, feeling far more fluid and considered, and worthy of being a single that gains them some much deserved coverage. Check out Virgins below and keep your ears open for their debut album later in the year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
